document_data.caption: A map showing Lake Icemelt in northwest Impiltur.
document_data.name: Lake Icemelt
document_data.mainbody: '''Lake Icemelt''' was found high in the peaks of the [[Earthspur Mountains]] in southern [[Damara]].
document_data.Geography: The lake was found near the [[High Pass]] toward the middle of the mountain range just south of the [[Earthwood]]. The [[River Icehilt]] flowed from the lake's southern shore into [[Impiltur]].
